name: Siege - Battle of Ashington
description: ched a dangerous oath with the ancient wizarding people, and finally sealed the Skeleton King. The war had ended and humans began to rebuild the world order. Humans and wizards are constantly in conflict for their own benefit. In the end, Humans violated the ancient oath.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 591 MB available space
